TopicTitle: Which axis in Unity is RCS thrust transform?

Articles.Content:
A quickie - which axis of the thrust transform should point out of an RCS thruster?

In case of engines, I remember it's blue (Z) but RCS had either X or Y and I'm not sure which. And I'm not really in the mood to try experimentally and redo it if I'm wrong.
Ok, NVM, Y - the green axis.
